duties_responsibilities.duty: Improve efficiency and effectiveness throughout the software/application development life cycle.
Consult with cross-functional departments and IT teams to understand development and release processes.
Proactively seek automation opportunities in software development pipelines.
Provide technical expertise and guidance on solving day-to-day issues and problems with AppDev tool platforms.
Identify opportunities for tools’ integration and automation in the software development pipeline.
Support creation and execution of roadmaps/plans for AppDev tools in alignment to overall tool platform strategies, cloud hosting strategies, Security, and compliance guidelines.
Management of User Accounts, software licenses, etc. to ensure optimal utilization of resources and control costs.
Support adherence to GxP IT processes relevant to the AppDev tool platforms.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
Experience using AppDev Tool platforms such as Atlassian Jira, GitHub, Jenkins, etc.
Industry Certification in one or more AppDev tool platforms and AWS cloud hosting infrastructure
